beings.title: I love women
beings.alt_text: An 88x31 animated button showing a snowy nighttime landscape linked to Nomi's website. On it we can see: a seal passing by, a black haired person in a dark dress waving an ancom flag, a falling star, the crescent moon and an aurora.

beings.title: Witix
beings.alt_text: An 88x31 button: 'Witix now!' with a bi anarchist symbol next to it.

beings.title: Mandarynki.eu
beings.alt_text: An 88x31 button: it is a 3-element slideshow with captions 'We love tangerines', 'co-hosted in EU and PL', and the mandarynki.eu domain name.

beings.title: Green
beings.alt_text: A beige button with the word green, a non-binary checkmark, some vines with orange leaves, and a green gradient border.

beings.title: Cadence
beings.alt_text: The text "cadence now!" on a purple background. There is a moon-shaped logo on the left side and a tiny star in the bottom right.

beings.title: Lars
beings.alt_text: An 88x31 button: 'hi i'm lars' with a brown haired stick figure next to it

beings.title: Dimden
beings.alt_text: The text 'DIMDEN' in big cyan block letters on a dark background, and 'ホテル' (hotel in japanese) in purple under that. There is a slight CRT scanline effect applied to the whole thing.

beings.title: Luzie
beings.alt_text: An 88x31 button: Animated 'Luzie's Kennel' text in a rainbow gradient on a black background

other.title: Estrogen

other.alt_text: An 88x31 button, showing the rust lang logo

other.title: Free Palestine
other.alt_text: An 88x31 button, showing 'Free Palestine' text next to a black long haired person with a palestinian flag.

other.title: Google Chrome IS EVIL! (so is whole Google tbf)
other.alt_text: An 88x31 button, showing 'Google Chrome IS EVIL!' text next to a spinning pentagram.

other.title: Powered by Linux (Xenia)
other.alt_text: An 88x31 button, showing 'Powered by Linux' text next to the alternative Linux mascot, Xenia.

other.title: NFTs? No Fucking Thanks
other.alt_text: An 88x31 button, showing 'No Fucking Thanks' text (with N, F and T in red) next to a happy emoji bonking NFT monkey.

other.title: Polypan
other.alt_text: An 88x31 button, showing polyamorous flag combined with pansexual flag.
